title: Strong named assemblies
body:
Hi! Just getting started with SkiaSharp for Xamarin Android/iOS. Hoping it will perform much better than the custom view drawing that I am using at the moment.
Because of the way my projects are structured, it would be helpful if the SkiaSharp assemblies delivered via NuGet were strongly named.
I can help/offer advice if you need any.

comments.author: mattleibow
mattleibow
comments.body: Approval from the boss! Going to be signing with the mono key.
